scenes.title: Homepage Exploration
scenes.narration: YouTube's homepage welcomes us with a wide range of content. Let's explore!

shots.text: YouTube - Enjoy the videos and music you love

scenes.title: Search Results
scenes.narration: The search results appear instantly. We can see a variety of videos related to our query.

shots.text: How to Make the Perfect Pizza Dough - Cooking with Julia

scenes.title: Video Interaction
scenes.narration: We can interact with the video. Let's like and comment on it.

shots.text: Great recipe! Tried it last night.

coverage: This demo showcases YouTube's user-friendly interface, efficient search functionality, and interactive features. Users can explore, search for videos, interact with them, and engage through likes and comments.
assumptions: Basic web literacy, ability to use a mouse and keyboard.
risks: The internet connection might affect the smoothness of the demo. Users might need to scroll to see all content on the page.

segments.text: Welcome to YouTube's homepage! We see the iconic logo and a concise site description. The clean layout hints at an intuitive user experience.
Let's dive into the search bar, it's right here. I'm going to search for 'Cooking' to explore some tasty videos.
These are our search results. We get a comprehensive list of videos related to cooking. See how the page loads content quickly?
Check this out! We can easily interact with the video. I'll give it a like and also add a comment. It's nice to have a platform where we can engage with other users.
Our comment is posted! It's simple to share our thoughts and connect with others.
